short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Browser extension to extend LiquidVoice Automatic PCI DSS functionality

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Designed specifically to cater for embedded payment methods within pages where the URL does not get exposed to the client.

Can be customised by Liquid Voice to be triggered by focus, click or a number of other events within the browser.
